subject: Rodeos
Cattle
lead_paragraph: Justin McBride, as the No. 1 rider in the Built Ford Tough Series, will be eligible tonight to attempt the richest ride in Professional Bull Riders history. McBride, who has already set a record for the season with $467,000 in earnings, could add $150,000 more with a successful ride on the bull Scene of the Crash. Just by attempting to ride Scene of the Crash, McBride will receive $25,000, and if he covers the bull for the required eight seconds, he will add another $125,000, making it the richest ride in P.B.R. history.McBride has never faced the 1,650-pound bull. In 2006 and 2007 regular-season competition, Scene of the Crash has a 100-percent buck-off percentage in 27 attempts. He has only been ridden twice in his career in 51 regular-season tries.
